value_claims.claim_title: Fin AI Agent resolved over 8 million customer queries
value_claims.claim_description: Fin AI Agent has helped customers with more than 8 million queries since launch, demonstrating significant adoption and scale in customer service automation.
value_claims.source_quote: it has already helped customers with more than 8 million queries
value_claims.attribution_evidence: The claim explicitly states Fin AI Agent directly helped customers with queries, with no other systems mentioned as contributing to this outcome.

value_claims.claim_title: Fin AI Agent resolves up to 80% of conversations instantly
value_claims.claim_description: Fin AI Agent achieves resolution rates of up to 80% of customer conversations, providing immediate automated support without human intervention.
value_claims.source_quote: resolves up to 80% of conversations instantly
value_claims.attribution_evidence: The resolution rate is directly attributed to Fin AI Agent's capability to handle customer conversations autonomously.

value_claims.claim_title: AI Copilot increased agent efficiency by 31% at Lightspeed
value_claims.claim_description: Lightspeed, an early tester of AI Copilot, experienced a 31% increase in agent efficiency by using the AI assistant to help agents find answers faster.
value_claims.source_quote: One of our early testers, Lightspeed, has already seen a 31% increase in agent efficiency with AI Copilot.
value_claims.quote_location: Section: A personal AI assistant for every agent
value_claims.attribution_evidence: The efficiency gain is directly attributed to the use of AI Copilot, which provides agents with instant answers from multiple content sources.

value_claims.claim_title: Fin 2 achieved 51% average resolution rate across customers
value_claims.claim_description: Customers using Fin 2 see an average resolution rate of 51%, with an accuracy rate of 99.9%, demonstrating improved performance over the initial version.
value_claims.source_quote: customers using Fin 2 see an average resolution rate of 51%, with an accuracy rate of 99.9%
value_claims.quote_location: Section: The best AI agent just got better
value_claims.attribution_evidence: The resolution and accuracy rates are directly attributed to Fin 2's capabilities in handling customer service queries autonomously.

value_claims.claim_description: Fin 2 demonstrates exceptional accuracy with a 99.9% accuracy rate in resolving customer queries, ensuring high-quality automated support.
value_claims.source_quote: customers using Fin 2 see an average resolution rate of 51%, with an accuracy rate of 99.9%
value_claims.quote_location: Section: The best AI agent just got better
value_claims.attribution_evidence: The accuracy rate is directly measured from Fin 2's performance in providing correct answers to customer queries.

value_claims.claim_title: Over 20% of customers achieve above 80% resolution rate with Fin 2
value_claims.claim_description: More than 20% of Intercom's customers using Fin 2 are achieving resolution rates exceeding 80%, demonstrating high performance for optimized implementations.
value_claims.source_quote: Over 20% of our customers are getting above 80%
value_claims.attribution_evidence: The high resolution rates are directly attributed to Fin 2's capabilities when properly configured and optimized by customers.

value_claims.claim_title: Fin 2 average resolution rate climbed to 66% across 6,000+ customers
value_claims.claim_description: Since Fin 2 launch, the average resolution rate has increased to 66% across Intercom's customer base of over 6,000 customers.
value_claims.source_quote: Since we launched Fin 2, its average resolution rate has continued to climb to 66% across our 6,000+ customers.
value_claims.attribution_evidence: The resolution rate improvement is directly attributed to Fin 2's enhanced capabilities and continuous optimization.

value_claims.claim_title: Fin handled 14 million customer support requests
value_claims.claim_description: By October 2024, Fin AI Agent had handled 14 million customer support requests, demonstrating significant scale and adoption.
value_claims.source_quote: The first iteration of Fin, released in March 2023, has already handled 14 million customer support requests
value_claims.attribution_evidence: The 14 million requests were directly handled by Fin AI Agent without human intervention.

value_claims.claim_title: Fin saved 1.2 million hours for support teams
value_claims.claim_description: Fin AI Agent saved support teams a total of 1.2 million hours by automating customer support requests that would otherwise require human handling.
value_claims.source_quote: saved 1.2 million hours for support teams
value_claims.attribution_evidence: The time savings are directly attributed to Fin's automation of support requests, eliminating the need for human agent involvement.

value_claims.claim_title: Fin resolved 50% of customer requests on average
value_claims.claim_description: The first iteration of Fin AI Agent resolved an average of 50% of customer requests, establishing a baseline for automated customer service performance.
value_claims.source_quote: resolved 50 percent of customer requests on average
value_claims.attribution_evidence: The resolution rate is directly attributed to Fin's ability to autonomously handle customer requests without human intervention.

value_claims.claim_title: Two specialists enable 50 FTE worth of coverage at Anthropic
value_claims.claim_description: At Anthropic, two AI specialists (systems/automation and knowledge/content) enable almost 50 full-time employees' worth of customer support coverage using Fin.
value_claims.source_quote: We're a lean but focused team of two specialists. What's really cool is that those two specialists actually enable almost 50 full-time employees' worth of coverage in our volume.
value_claims.quote_location: Section: We got a look at what AI transformation looks like inside Anthropic
value_claims.attribution_evidence: The workforce efficiency is directly attributed to Fin AI Agent managed by two specialists, replacing the need for 50 FTEs.

value_claims.claim_title: Fin initially answered over 25% of customer questions with minimal optimization
value_claims.claim_description: When first launched, Fin AI Agent could answer over 25% of customer questions using only existing help center content with little optimization.
value_claims.source_quote: just using a company's existing help center content with little optimization, it could answer over 25% of customer questions
value_claims.quote_location: Section: The best AI agent just got better
value_claims.attribution_evidence: The 25% resolution rate is directly attributed to Fin's capability to leverage existing content without additional configuration.

context_claims.claim_title: Fin AI Agent launched in March 2023
context_claims.claim_description: Intercom launched the first version of Fin AI Agent in March 2023, marking the first AI-powered agent designed specifically for customer service.
context_claims.source_quote: When we launched Fin AI Agent in March 2023, it was the first AI-powered agent designed specifically for customer service.

context_claims.claim_description: Intercom announced Fin AI Copilot as a companion product to Fin AI Agent to assist human agents with complex queries.
context_claims.source_quote: When we launched our groundbreaking Fin AI Agent last year, it set the standard for generative AI customer service experiences

context_claims.claim_description: Intercom released Fin 2, the second generation of its AI agent, in October 2024 with enhanced capabilities.
context_claims.source_quote: Intercom today launched Fin 2, the latest version of its artificial intelligence agent for customer service.

context_claims.claim_description: Intercom announced Fin 3 at their Pioneer 2025 summit, introducing capabilities for handling complex, multi-step queries.
context_claims.source_quote: At Pioneer 2025, our Chief Product Officer Paul Adams announced Fin 3: the best AI Agent for resolving deep, complex queries across every channel.

context_claims.claim_title: Intercom has over 6,000 customers using Fin
context_claims.claim_description: Intercom's customer base using Fin AI Agent exceeds 6,000 organizations as of the Fin 2 launch period.
context_claims.source_quote: its average resolution rate has continued to climb to 66% across our 6,000+ customers

context_claims.claim_title: Intercom operates in customer service software industry
context_claims.claim_description: Intercom provides AI-powered customer service platform solutions for businesses across various industries.
context_claims.source_quote: Intercom is leading the industry into a new era of AI-first Customer Service

context_claims.claim_description: Fin AI Agent is designed to handle customer service and support functions, including query resolution and customer assistance.
context_claims.source_quote: it was the first AI-powered agent designed specifically for customer service

context_claims.claim_description: Fin AI Agent and AI Copilot provide multilingual support across 45 languages including Arabic, French, and Japanese.
context_claims.source_quote: AI Copilot can also provide multilingual support in the same 45 languages as Fin AI Agent – from Arabic, to French, to Japanese, and more.

context_claims.claim_description: Fin AI Agent works across multiple customer service channels including chat, email, WhatsApp, Voice, Slack, and Discord.
context_claims.source_quote: Fin is omnichannel, working equally well across chat, email, WhatsApp, and more.

context_claims.claim_title: Intercom's mission is to make internet business personal
context_claims.claim_description: Intercom's core mission is to make internet business personal by enabling concierge-level service for every customer.
context_claims.source_quote: Since the beginning of Intercom, our mission has been to make internet business personal.

context_claims.claim_title: Vision for unified Customer Agent across entire customer journey
context_claims.claim_description: Intercom's strategic vision is to evolve Fin into a unified Customer Agent capable of handling the entire customer experience beyond just support.
context_claims.source_quote: Fin will not be just the world's best Customer Service Agent. It will be the world's best Customer Agent, capable of handling the entire customer experience.

context_claims.claim_title: Lightspeed is an early tester of AI Copilot
context_claims.claim_description: Lightspeed participated as an early tester of Intercom's AI Copilot feature.
context_claims.source_quote: One of our early testers, Lightspeed, has already seen a 31% increase in agent efficiency with AI Copilot.

context_claims.claim_title: Anthropic uses Fin for customer support operations
context_claims.claim_description: Anthropic, the AI company, uses Intercom's Fin AI Agent for their customer support operations.
context_claims.source_quote: Isabel Larrow, Product Support Operations Lead at Anthropic, took to the stage with our VP of Customer Success and Solutions Junan Pang

context_claims.claim_title: Fin pricing model is $0.99 per resolution
context_claims.claim_description: Intercom charges $0.99 per resolution for Fin AI Agent, only charging when Fin successfully resolves a customer query.
context_claims.source_quote: The same as it always did – $0.99 cents per resolution. We only charge you if Fin delivers a resolution.

context_claims.claim_description: Intercom's Fin is used by various enterprise customers including Toast, Crypto.com, Gamma, Rocket Money, Nuuly, AppFolio, and Deliverect.
context_claims.source_quote: We heard from companies like Anthropic, Gamma, Toast, Crypto.com, and more about how they've transformed their support operations with AI.
